entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to a bear or bears.
examples: Formerly, there must have been some kind of rule (to which I remember a striking exception), that if a peculiarly savage bear could be found in the naval service, he was selected as an agent for transports.... The subsequent encouragement of these ursal authorities was generally referable to military commandeers, whose ignorance of nautical matters led them to extol services that had no merit...

entries.meaning: (rare, archaic) The ursine seal or sea bear, better known as the northern fur seal, Callorhinus ursinus.
examples: One of these, the Ursal, an inhabitant of the shores of the North Pacific Ocean,  [â€¦]
